sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const[reqNo,setReq]=useState(null) const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState(null) const[description,setDes]=useState(null) const[amount,setAmount]=useState(null) const[recipient,setRecp]=useState(null) const[donors,setDonors]=useState(null) const[voters,setVoters]=useState(null) const[completed,setCom]=useState(null) const[Requests,setRequests]=useState([]) const requestInfo=async(props)=>{ const info = await props.contract1.methods.getRequeststatus().call(); setReq(info[5]) setCaddress(info[3]) setDes(info[2]) setAmount(props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[6])) setCom(info[7]) setVoters(info[0]) setDonors(info[1]) setRecp(info[4]) setRequests([info]) } useEffect(()=>{ requestInfo(); },props.refresh) return (
{console.log(props.contract)} Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {reqNo} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} ) )}
) } export default ShowRequest
